Key Match Events: France scored the first goal just before halftime through Kolo Muani after a mishit by Dembele.
Belgium couldn't equalize and France scored again on 57 minutes with a fine effort by Dembele.
Pre-Game Insights: Deschamps emphasized the team's reaction to the previous loss against Italy.
Belgium came into the match fresh from a 2-1 win over Israel.
Post-Match Reflections: Deschamps expressed relief after the win but acknowledged that everything wasn't fixed.
The match was a repeat of the Euro 2024 last-16 tie which France won 1-0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: France fielded a non-full-strength team with Mbappe rested.
The win boosted confidence after the defeat by Italy.
Others: The match was held in Lyon, France.
